expressionLang.description: Identifies the expression language used for workflow expressions. Default is 'jq'

keepActive.description: If 'true', workflow instances is not terminated when there are no active execution paths. Instance can be terminated via 'terminate end definition' or reaching defined 'execTimeout'

oneOf.description: Cron expression defining when workflow instances should be created (automatically)

expression.description: Repeating interval (cron expression) describing when the workflow instance should be created

validUntil.description: Specific date and time (ISO 8601 format) when the cron expression invocation is no longer valid

interrupt.description: If `false`, workflow instance is allowed to finish current execution. If `true`, current workflow execution is abrupted.

runBefore.description: Name of a workflow state to be executed before workflow instance is terminated

oneOf.description: Name of state to transition to

nextState.description: Name of state to transition to

produceEvents.description: Array of events to be produced before the transition happens

compensate.description: If set to true, triggers workflow compensation when before this transition is taken. Default is false

error.description: Domain-specific error name, or '*' to indicate all possible errors

code.description: Error code. Can be used in addition to the name to help runtimes resolve to technical errors/exceptions. Should not be defined if error is set to '*'

retryRef.description: References a unique name of a retry definition.

transition.description: Transition to next state to handle the error. If retryRef is defined, this transition is taken only if retries were unsuccessful.

end.description: End workflow execution in case of this error. If retryRef is defined, this ends workflow only if retries were unsuccessful.

eventRefs.description: References one or more unique event names in the defined workflow events

actionMode.description: Specifies how actions are to be performed (in sequence of parallel)

actions.description: Actions to be performed if expression matches

timeout.description: Time period to wait for function execution to complete

triggerEventRef.description: Reference to the unique name of a 'produced' event definition

resultEventRef.description: Reference to the unique name of a 'consumed' event definition

data.description: If string type, an expression which selects parts of the states data output to become the data (payload) of the event referenced by 'triggerEventRef'. If object type, a custom object to become the data (payload) of the event referenced by 'triggerEventRef'.

contextAttributes.description: Add additional extension context attributes to the produced event

schedule.description: Define the time/repeating intervals or cron at which workflow instances should be automatically started.

oneOf.description: Time interval (must be repeating interval) described with ISO 8601 format. Declares when workflow instances will be automatically created.  (UTC timezone is assumed)

interval.description: Time interval (must be repeating interval) described with ISO 8601 format. Declares when workflow instances will be automatically created.

timezone.description: Timezone name used to evaluate the interval & cron-expression. (default: UTC)

terminate.description: If true, completes all execution flows in the given workflow instance

produceEvents.description: Defines events that should be produced

compensate.description: If set to true, triggers workflow compensation. Default is false

produceeventdef.description: Produce an event and set its data

input.description: Workflow expression to filter the state data input

output.description: Workflow expression that filters the state data output

data.description: Workflow expression that filters of the event data (payload)

toStateData.description: Workflow expression that selects a state data element to which the event payload should be added/merged into. If not specified, denotes, the top-level state data element.

fromStateData.description: Workflow expression that selects state data that the state action can use

results.description: Workflow expression that filters the actions data results

toStateData.description: Workflow expression that selects a state data element to which the action results should be added/merged into. If not specified, denote, the top-level state data element

expression.description: Expression evaluated against SubFlow state data. SubFlow will repeat execution as long as this expression is true or until the max property count is reached

checkBefore.description: If true, the expression is evaluated before each repeat execution, if false the expression is evaluated after each repeat execution

max.description: Sets the maximum amount of repeat executions

continueOnError.description: If true, repeats executions in a case unhandled errors propagate from the sub-workflow to this state

stopOnEvents.description: List referencing defined consumed workflow events. SubFlow will repeat execution until one of the defined events is consumed, or until the max property count is reached
